name: Cat Island
description:
The Game

Cat Island is a game about cats bossing you around and asking you to do stuff they're too lazy to do themselves.

It's really cute though !

Complete quests to unlock different tools / weapons, or even unlock different dresses and hats to customise the playable charcater.

Ideally played with an xbox controller, but keyboard/mouse compatible.

Credits

3D models, rigs, textures, shaders, programming, FX, and some SFX, by me, Piers Bishop.

Music composed by Alex Lewis.

Character animations come from Explosive on Unity Asset Store.

Most SFX come from Little Robot Sound Factory on Unity Asset Store.

Made with Unity, Blender, and Krita.

Download

The .zip file contains the standard Unity stuff (the .exe file, _Data folder, and Unityplayer.dll), as well as a .pdf file detailing the controls.
